original: 大人麾下兵強馬壯，若再得器利之便，何愁天下不定？小的恰好熟識一伙匠人，僅需三千金錢即可僱傭，不知大人意下如何？
text: Adults have strong soldiers and horses, if you have more tools, why worry about the uncertainty of the world? The little one happens to know a group of craftsmen, who can be hired for only three thousand dollars. I don't know what the adults want?
